metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17001 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A Content-Security-Policy that blocks in-line scripts could be bypassedusing an object tag to execute JavaScript in the protected document(cross-site scripting). This is a separate bypass fromCVE-2019-17000.*Note: This flaw only affected Firefox 69 and was notpresent in earlier versions.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 70.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
